title: Why God Of War Ragnarok Was Delayed -- Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.30.21
description:
Tam and Andy talk about the reason behind God of Wars Ragnarok's delay, Sony acquiring Bluepoint, Xbox at TGS, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:25 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO Life is Strange Spoilercast and Gamescast with Jared Petty!
NEXT WEEK, Blessing and Andy are taking part in Panda's All Star Nickvitational; a HUGE Nickelodeon All Star Brawl tournament featuring a bunch of big YouTubers and streamers like Ovilee, Moist Critikal, Ludwig, and more--sounds like a bunch of scrubs to me but it's all to raise charity for The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.
Andy and Bless need YOUR help. Competitors in the tournament and their communities have 1 week to raise money to bid on their favorite character. That's based on the money you donate. Right now you can go to kindafunny.com/bless and kindafunny.com/andy to donate so the guys can bid on the character of their choice. Vote for who you want but I would encourage folks to go Nigel Thornberry for Bless and CatDog for Andy.
And remember that money all goes to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.
The tournament is happening on Tuesday, October 5th at noon PT on Twitch.tv/pandaglobal.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:50 - Sources: Destruction All-Stars studio Lucid handed Twisted Metal revival -- VGC, Andy Robinson
00:14:14 - Developers Are Making Games for a Nintendo 4K Console That Doesn’t Exist - Bloomberg, Takashi Mochizuki and Olga Kharif
00:19:50 - Christopher Judge Says God of War Ragnarok Was Delayed Because He Had Multiple Health Issues, And Sony Santa Monica Was Super Chill About It
00:29:40 -Xbox TGS Roundup
00:35:00 - Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy - The Definitive Edition Has Been Rated In Korea -- Nibel
00:40:40 - PlayStation Officially Acquires Bluepoint Games
00:47:45 - Ad
00:50:52 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:58:15 - Japan is a GIANT mobile and handheld market, so would xCloud fit well in over there? - The Nano Biologist
01:04:45 - Squad Up: Matt Allen - @closedforum on Twitter
01:05:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Janet

NEXT WEEK, Blessing and Andy are taking part in Panda's All Star Nickvitational; a HUGE Nickelodeon All Star Brawl tournament featuring a bunch of big YouTubers and streamers like Ovilee, Moist Critikal, Ludwig, and more--sounds like a bunch of scrubs to me but it's all to raise charity for The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.

Andy and Bless need YOUR help. Competitors in the tournament and their communities have 1 week to raise money to bid on their favorite character. That's based on the money you donate. Right now you can go to kindafunny.com/bless and kindafunny.com/andy to donate so the guys can bid on the character of their choice.
